item.source: Found a anti massing tutorial on another sight and

item.title: Found a anti massing tutorial on another sight and
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

if(clicktimer == 0) {
	if(clicks >= 3) {
		if(warn == 0) {
			sendMessage("NO MASS CLICKING ALLOWED!");
			sendMessage("Do it again and you will be kicked!");
			warn = 1;
			clicks = 0;
			clicktimer = 2; // one second
		} else {
			disconnected = true;
			warn = 0;
		}
	}
}
if (clicktimer > 0) {
	clicktimer-=1;
}

And disconnecting them is the same thing as kicking them lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Found a anti massing tutorial on another sight and
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

It told me to add this to process() and I did.

if(clicktimer == 0) { if(clicks >= 3) { if(warn == 0) { sendMessage("NO MASS CLICKING ALLOWED!"); warn = 1; clicks = 0; clicktimer = 2; // one second } else { sendMessage("You have been reported to the admin"); flagAccount("mass clicking"); warn = 0; } } } if (clicktimer > 0) { clicktimer-=1; }

There’s nothing wrong with the code, I was just wondering how I could make it kick the person then send those messages.

Read full topic
